# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he integrates business systems into manufacturing processes, focusing on continuous learning and innovative technology application to identify and resolve inefficiencies.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris brings over 20 years of experience in industrial digital transformation. He developed the "5C" closed-loop feedback approach (Connect, Collect, Combine, Compute, Convey) for IIoT implementation and is the innovator behind the SHARC IoT Adapter, a universal sensor adapter for bridging legacy machinery with digital systems.

[Free IIoT Assessment](https://chrismisztur.com/audit.html): Free consultation / discovery call
